V2_Path.description: Handler path. Auto-generated with some secret value.

SS_DNS.description: DNS server(s) to use instead of one provided by your cloud server.

AppName.description: App Name filled in at the top (or even full domain if there is a custom one) to generate the configuration and QR code. If you donâ€™t want to generate it, enter no

QR_Path.description: Password-protected path to page with ss:// configuration link and a QR code. Cannot be the same as V2_Path. If the AppName variable is no, this variable has no effect

QR_User.description: QR_Path page auth username (http basic auth).

QR_Pass.description: QR_Path page auth password (http basic auth).

Proxy_Path.description: Site to proxy when trying to access urls other than QR_path/V2_Path. Must include scheme and not include a trailing slash.
